title: Go, preach my gospel, saith the Lord

verses.text: Go, preach my gospel, saith the Lord; Bid the whole world my grace receive; He shall be saved that trusts my word; And they condemned who disbelieve.
I'll make your great commission known, And ye shall prove my gospel true By all the works that I have done, By all the wonders ye shall do.
Teach all the nations my commands; I'm with you till the world shall end; All power is trusted in my hands, I can destroy, and I defend.
He spake, and light shone round his head; On a bright cloud to Heaven he rode; They to the farthest nations spread The grace of their ascended Lord.
